name: Eltokill Demo
description:
Note: Blastgun, Fire Spell and Spider have no sounds yet

What is Eltokill?

Eltokill is a "retro" first person shooter powered by the gzdoom engine. The game has you finding items to fix certain switches, making objects using a forge and killing monsters with powerful flames powered by spells. 

You play as Elto, a creature that woke up in his house to a loud bang coming from outside. You get up, and walk out to see that your loved one had been killed. Everything around you seems destroyed in the town of Greenville, and you gain the objective of destroying whatever did this. It won't be easy, though. Zemonard hands are spotted on the ground, sitting still. It was them who invaded, and so you know where to go now.

Gameplay

Finding items and shooting monsters is the experience here.

Features

  • 3 available weapons (6 if you use cheats): Stone Axe, Blastgun and a Nard Axe that comes with a flame spell.
  •  2 short playable maps 
  • 3 enemy types (Creep, Freak and Spider)
  • Mspaint graphics
  • 5 difficulty options (Rotton, Fearful, Hurt, Violent, Torment)
  • Puzzle Items

Created by

Mainly by "Elto" Miller. Sound effects and music, along with some textures and enemies are made by the Freedoom team. These assets are from the game Freedoom, a free content first person shooter.

The full version of Eltokill will contain 6 levels in total.
